column1: #text=My sister went to the library to borrow a book .
#text=She had a library card from the city library .
#text=When she was inside the library , she sat in the front of the computer to check the catalog .
#text=She typed the name of the book that she was looking for .
#text=She got the number from the computer search results .
#text=She wrote down the number and looked through the books in the shelf .
#text=She made sure it was the one she was looking for .
#text=She then went to the front desk to check out the book .
#text=The staff in the library took her book and her library card .
#text=He scanned her card from the machine and printed out a note .
#text=It has the information of the book , when it was checked out and the date she needed to return to the library .
#text=The staff told her to return before the date to avoid any penalty .
